TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_button
inventory=[{"type": "salmon", "quantity": 8, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 56, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_button, I need to place the polished_blackstone at slot 34 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_button
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 8, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 56, "index": 19}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 23, "index": 39}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished_blackstone_button by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
